Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Lovely and cozy. The fondue was very yummy. I loved it. It was my second time and I‚Äôll come back for sure. Very small place but is nice vibe. The service is good.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Great fondue and good service and reasonable price. The restaurant a little bit cramp in term of space and seating. For these time of covid situation, you don't feel like to sitting near someone not in your family. Other than that everything Great.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Cute restaurant with great service. We had a meat and a cheese fondue and they were great! The cheese fondue is gluten free and they have gluten free bread. Unfortunately the meat one is not gluten free. Would recommend as a fun place for dinner

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Fundue & Fondue was excellent. I can highly recommend both the food and the service there. ‚Ä¶

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text:
Tasty menu! We had some starters, then the meat and Dutch Cheese fondue, and then the Chocolate one. Worth trying them all :P Great service: Staff are helpful, trying to make everything to make you comfortable, attentive and smiley!
Place is very cosy. But it's small, so  A RESERVATION IS A MUST

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Good food / service is very friendly and super attentive - great job!!

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: A great experience. Our waiter was super friendly, quick and attentive and gave great recommendations for food and wine. A younger waiter appeared bored and seemed to purposely ignore you when trying to get his attention (which was a pity) - however a really wonderful evening. Definitely a spot we‚Äôll be going back to!

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: We us the cheese fondue, Pinot Grigio and Lost Lugagge (wine). The food was tasty, especially the veggies, Pinot Grigio also great, lost luggage a bit rough. The service was putting in an effort but very disorganized and slow. Upon paying ‚Ä¶

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: What a feast! Barely walked back home. Wine selection might be wider. Excellent service (props for late playlist üòç) pics before & after

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: The truffle fondue was great. Staff is very friendly. We had a great evening here!

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Amazing cheese fondue! Delicious chocolate fondue, nice service!

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: I come from Lugano, Switzerland, and this is so far the best fondue I have ever had! The classic one is even better than the one I used to eat at home! The service was also really friendly and accurate with the wine's match! If you go to Amsterdam you must pass through.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Excellent food and huge portions! Totally worth the price! Highly recommend!

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Fantastic fondue, great selection of wines, takes me back to my time spent in Switzerland. Unfortunately loses one star as the restaurant itself is too tightly packed, maybe lose a table or two? It was also extremely hot inside.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Lovely place for a cozy night out. We tried the Dutch cheeses fondue and it was pretty good; you can get this with meat but the menu can also be adapted to fit a vegetarian diet.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: This place is great for fondue! Meat or cheese, were here for a team event and they were very accommodating for our group, even making one fondue with no alcohol. It's a cozy place so best to book, and good value for money, none of us left hungry.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Food isn't great, but the good staff made it a better experience. Our whole table ordered the vegetarian option and bacon was put on each salad. Also, small pickles were served to go in the fondue, some other option would have been better suited.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Staff is very kind. They have starters, multi-course menus and 3 types of fondues. Waiter takes the time to explain. We just wanted a burger though so this wasnt our place.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: On the expensive side. Lovely ambiance. Our waiter was not attentive at all. The place is small and he kept passing me 3x with my hand raised and yet still didn‚Äôt do anything. Just eventually gave up. Didn‚Äôt realize the ‚Äúmeat‚Äù fondue didn‚Äôt come with cheese. Truffle cheese fondue was delicious.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Walked into an empty restaurant 15 minutes after opening while on vacation to surprise my wife. Was told we could sit but we but we would only be allowed an hour to eat because of their full reservation list at 7. Every other place we had ‚Ä¶

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text:
I visited this place with a party of 10 people on a Wednesday night.
We had reserved a table well in advance but it was clear when we arrived the place had been overbooked. ‚Ä¶

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Just amazing fondue with friendly and helpful staff. Great vibe and decor in the venue along with good facilities and selection on menu. Highly recommend in the summer months as it get crazy busy in winter apparently.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Very good food for Amsterdam standards. We had cheese and meet fondue and was really good. The salads were indifferent. Very friendly stuff which is rare! It's better to make a reservation and the place is very small

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: An amazing atmosphere,  it's quite small and homely. And you can look right into the kitchen. The staff was really friendly and food was prepared rather quickly. Definently a worthwile place to visit if you are nearby.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Great food and service. We were a group of 4 and made the mistake of all ordering the meat fondue as we were fondue rookies and didn't realised the meet was cooked in a broth fondue and not cheese.  If we had our choice again we would choose 2 x Meat and 2 x Cheese and share.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text:
Heerlijk eten bij fondue&fondue gastvrijheid Amazing.
I went there with my girlfriend last night and we had a delicious dinner and a great service the staff were really nice. They have also a good wijn üç∑muno and lemoncheelo.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: I was recommended this place by a coworker, and went here to check it out. It's higher end pricing, personal chef style place. Very limited seating, very friendly staff who both cook and wait and give great suggestions and take great pride ‚Ä¶

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: By far the best restaurant we have visited in Amsterdam! The food was very tasty and the service was outstanding!! Thank you very much guys for a wonderful evening with lots of laughs!

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Fantastic food and service! Could not read dutch so asked waiter to bring out his recommendation for our group of 5. Especially loved the cheese  fondue. Definitely recommend.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: We were put next to the door, which is awful. There weren't any tables left, because they were all booked. Eventually we could sit somewhere else. ‚Ä¶

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Always a pleasant evening. Cheese fondue is delicious. It nicely pairs with Portugal wine.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: We had the Dutch fondue with Zaanse mustard and it was delicious.  Good selection of veggies and a salad was provided. We had the chocolate fondue for dessert and a scroppino also.  Not cheap, but delicious.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Amazing food, which is only bettered by the service. This restaurant offers a intimate environment and cosy atmosphere and is well worth a visit!

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Excellent service. Fantastic food. Really liked cooking in broth instead of oil.  The only issue is public transportation is limited later in the evening

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: We had to wait quite long even though we had a reservation. But it was worth the wait. Super friendly stuff and the food was just great. We had a 3 course menu and nothing disappointed us.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Great place. Friendly stuff. Medium high prices. Nothing negative to say, if it would not be for this: if you are with two, one must order the same kind of fondue. Limitations that takes 4 stars away.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: The food was spectacular, but the staff were even better. Could not have been more gracious or courteous.  Remember er to make reservations.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Prices were a bit steep but staff was exceedingly friendly and the fondue of the day (cheesy with beer and mustard) was amazing. Nice selection of wines and beers as well.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Absolutely, freaking delicious!

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: The cheese fondue is great!  Excellent with broccoli, bread, and potatoes.  The meat fondue was so-so.  The salad with mayo dressing and bell peppers was AMAZING.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Potatoes were overcooked and too salty, tuna did not look fresh and flies in wine. We mentioned our disappointment to the waiter who did not apologised nor took any initiative. Had to pay the full bill.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Excellent staff, very good food, I ate gambas pil-pil starter, Dutch kaas fondue, and chocolate fondue.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text:
A bit expensive but worth every cent spent on the incredible fondue. One of the best we've tried.
In addition, the service was absolutely lovely  :)

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Very nice moment and friendly staff, on top of a very quality food, for a reasonable price ! Will come back :)

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: If you like fondue (which I do!) then it's fantastic. Would recommend going in a group (4+) so that you can get various types :)

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Great fondue and wine selection, but not out of this world. Recommended if you are craving some fondue in a cold night.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: This place was amazing the staff were so friendly and chatty loved the atmosphere and the cheese fondue was soooo good i could of eaten it everyday.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Very nice service and super kind waiters üòä we had a lovely time

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: This place is a hidden gem. Everything is delicious and the staff have a great sense of humor

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: I highly recommend the dutch fondue and the New York Cheesecake. Also, super friendly staff!

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Great food and wine, but tables are very close too each other.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Delicious food, excellent service, great wine! Enjoy your time. üòâ

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Very good food quality, incredible flavours. A must if you come to Amsterdam

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Great service but just not real fondue... more powder texture than actual cheese...

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Booked a table, showed up, they were in a chaos and we couldn't have our table so we left.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
Review Text: Nice place offering various types of fondue - cheese, meat, fish and chocolate.

Name: Fondue & Fondue
